checklist.title: Have new resouces been added to preload cache?
Have redundant cached resources been removed?
checklist.description: Don't want to be preloading stuff we don't need to

checklist.title: Do the help screenshots reflect the current app/changes?
Have you been through the manual feature scenarios?
Have you updated the changelog if necessary?
Have the version numbers been updated if necessary?
checklist.description: package.json, app.live.json, app.test.json, git tags, changelog

checklist.title: Has the description been updated if neccesary?
Have been through README and updated as necessary?
Have hardcoded Mantra been updated if necessary?
Has everything been split into microservices that can be?
Do all the changes help people to enjoy life?
checklist.description: Devlopers, customers, me. Fun copy, features are actually good etc

checklist.title: Are all changes as DRY as possible?
Have you tested changes for performance?
Have all new manual processes been added to this checklist?
Does the trello card have enough info on it if we need to come back?
Do all tests accurately describe desired behaviour?
checklist.description: No fuzzy tests, random snapshots just for coverage, testing additional real world scenarios etc.

checklist.title: Do all tests not contain false positives?
checklist.description: Especially selenium tests which can often contain false positives

checklist.title: Have all files been split as sensibly as possible?
